project.name: BPMN2 :: Eclipse :: Editor :: Update site
project.description: To use this update site locally: - Build the drools project with maven (including the eclipse stuff). - Open Eclipse. - Open the menu "Help", menu item "Install new software..." - Click on the button "Add..." to add a new software site. - Fill in the name "BPMN2 Editor local update site" - Click on the button "Local..." and select "droolsjbpm/bpmn2-eclipse-editor/org.jboss.bpmn2.editor.updatesite/target/site/" - Select all the plugins. Click the buttons "Next" and "Finish".
